questionTitle: A long, long time ago there were two frogs who thought it would be a good idea to____.
They had never left their pond before and to them it was a very big____.
At first they thoroughly enjoyed themselves and for the first time in their lives experienced ____.
The weather was perfect and the sun never ____.
They found plenty of food and decided to stop and ____.
In the hot sun they started to feel sleepy and very soon ____.
Suddenly the sound of a cat meowing ____.
They ran into a farm house and jumped right into a barrel of milk where they____.
anwers: hopped and hopped in order not to sink
hopping and hopping in order not to sink
hoped and hoped in order not to sink
hoping and hoping in order not to sink

questionTitle: Sadly the smaller frog grew tired and drowned but the older one kept on moving about and in the morning ____.
anwers: found he was sat on a barrel of butter
found he sat on a barrel of butter
found he was sitting on a barrel of butter
found he sits on a barrel of butter
